tag_list: bestthinking, best-thinking, ceo-bestthinking, founder-bestthinking, reallywho, reallywho-com, ceo-reallywho-com, founder-reallywho-com
overview:
Currently, Mr. Butler is founder and CEO of Thinker Media, Inc . independent ebook publisher and developers of BestThinking.com and ThinkerBooks.com. He is also the founder of TechStarts+, a Research Triangle based Tech Startup Accelerator that specializes in getting new ventures to customers and revenue sooner and with less dilution to founders.

He was most recently a COO/GM for LexisNexis, one of the worldâ€™s largest online information and content providers with over 4 billion searchable documents, and a leader in identity verification. LexisNexis is part of Reed Elsevier, a leading publisher of scientific, medical, legal, and business journals and websites.

Previously, Mr. Butler was the founder and CEO of Time Matters Software (Data.TXT Corporation). Time Matters was one of the first major information and document management systems with an application-level browser interface. Under his leadership, Time Matters became one of the most widely used information and document management systems in the US legal market.
